short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Censor tweets that contain certain keywords or are (re)tweeted by certain users!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter Censor lets you censor tweets from your Twitter timeline. You can censor tweets based on certain keywords or from certain users.

**Tweets with cards/pics are not censored.**
